dcterms:creator: J. Fu
A. Kumar
O. Nachum
G. Tucker
S. Levine
dcterms:description: The AntMaze tasks require controlling an ant quadruped robot to navigate from a starting point to a desired goal location in a maze, with a reward of +1 for reaching the goal and 0 otherwise.
dcterms:title: AntMaze

dcterms:creator: J. Fu
A. Kumar
O. Nachum
G. Tucker
S. Levine
dcterms:description: The Franka Kitchen domain involves controlling a 9-DoF Franka robot to arrange a kitchen environment into a desired configuration, requiring the completion of four subtasks with binary rewards for each.
dcterms:title: FrankaKitchen

dcterms:creator: A. Nair
M. Dalal
A. Gupta
S. Levine
dcterms:description: The Adroit dexterous manipulation tasks involve controlling a 24-DoF shadow hand robot to perform complex manipulation skills, with tasks including manipulating a pen, opening a door, and relocating a ball, receiving sparse binary rewards.
dcterms:title: Adroit dexterous manipulation tasks

dcterms:creator: A. Kumar
A. Singh
F. Ebert
Y. Yang
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: The Visual Manipulation domain consists of a pick-and-place task where the agent must learn to pick an object and place it in a bin while avoiding distractor objects.
dcterms:title: Visual Manipulation

dcterms:creator: J. Fu
A. Kumar
O. Nachum
G. Tucker
S. Levine
dcterms:description: The D4RL locomotion tasks involve various locomotion environments for reinforcement learning, including halfcheetah, hopper, and walker tasks, aimed at evaluating the performance of RL algorithms.
dcterms:title: D4RL locomotion tasks
